title: Wales at the World Cup: Gareth Bale had 'no doubts' about historic goal against USA
description: Gareth Bale says he had "no doubts" about taking the penalty which brought Wales' first World Cup goal since 1958 to seal a 1-1 draw with the USA.

title: World Cup 2022: Neco Williams played after suffering family bereavement
description: Defender Neco Williams reveals he played in Wales' opening World Cup game after being told his grandfather had died.

title: We must wean economy off immigration, Labour leader to warn businesses
description: Sir Keir Starmer will promise a "pragmatic" immigration policy in a speech to business leaders.

title: World Cup: Rainbow hats confiscated, ex-Wales footballer says
description: Laura McAllister, the FAW's tournament ambassador, says she had to smuggle in LGBTQ supporting hat.

title: Jay Leno: Comedian released from hospital after being burned in fire
description: The US comedian spent 10 days receiving treatment after being burned in a fire at his garage.

title: Snoopy toy floats on Nasa mission around the Moon
description: A Snoopy toy is seen floating inside the Orion astronaut capsule that Nasa is testing at the Moon.

title: The moment Bale scored Wales' first World Cup goal since 1958
description: Watch the moment Gareth Bale scores Wales' first World Cup goal in 64 years to earn a draw against the United States.

title: Twitter charity partners condemn Musk's 'dangerous' changes
description: Two of Twitter's most important civil rights partners criticise reinstatement of Trump and West accounts

title: World Cup 2022: Gareth Bale rescues draw for Wales against USA
description: Watch highlights as Gareth Bale rescues a draw for Wales against the United States with a penalty to cancel out Timothy Weah's strike in their first World Cup game since 1958.

title: World Cup 2022: Netherlands leave it late to beat Senegal 2-0 - highlights
description: Watch highlights as the Netherlands leave it late to secure a 2-0 victory against Senegal in their first appearance at a World Cup since 2010 with goals from youngster Cody Gakpo and Davy Klaassen.

title: World Cup 2022: Lionel Messi 'in a great moment' for Argentina legend's final World Cup

title: World Cup 2022: All six England goals from rampant 6-2 win over Iran in 90 seconds

title: World Cup 2022: Jude Bellingham tournament debut draws praise from pundits
description: Fabulous footballer. Unbelievable player. Lampard and Gerrard rolled into one. Jude Bellingham's World Cup debut has many reaching for the superlatives.

title: World Cup 2022 Senegal 0-2 Netherlands: Late goals give Dutch crucial victory
description: Late goals give the Netherlands a crucial victory in their World Cup opener against Senegal in Group A.

title: World Cup 2022: No anxiety in France squad, says manager Didier Deschamps
description: France manager Didier Deschamps says there is no anxiety within his side's camp at the World Cup, despite the withdrawal of several of key players.

title: World Cup 2022: Iran win a 'great marker' but England 'must be better' - Gareth Southgate

title: Lady Leshurr denies assaulting ex-partner in Leyton
description: The rapper appears at Snaresbrook Crown Court accused of attacking two women during a fight.

title: World Cup 2022: Gareth Southgate 'happy' as England thrash Iran
